title: Ziv-Merhav estimation for hidden-Markov processes
authors: Nicholas Barnfield, Rapha\"el Grondin, Gaia Pozzoli, Renaud Raqu\'epas
abstract:
We present a proof of strong consistency of a Ziv-Merhav-type estimator of
the cross entropy rate for pairs of hidden-Markov processes. Our proof strategy
has two novel aspects: the focus on decoupling properties of the laws and the
use of tools from the thermodynamic formalism.
